title: Feature request - Email filter/rules convenience funtion
creator: Daniel.Mack
content:
Hi, I used Thunderbird at uni time and have to use MS office at work. For this reason I was a long time with MS at home as well. But now this needs to change. Not keen on MS Copilot BS any more. I think Thunderbird ticks all my email needs. some things are different, some better some worse, that´s ok. Personal I think there is a small but very important convenience feature missing, and that's about rules/filters.

Currently if you want to set up a rule/filter you need to remember or copy all details you want to reacted on before starting to create the rule, the you need to 1) click on the email-homepage, 2) filter 3) new 4) type in a name 5) type an email/ subject 6) What to do if true 7) save

it works and it does what is should. However what I love in MS office is that this can be done in 3 clicks. The function accessible strait on the top and already pre-populated if you go this direct way.

What could be added to Thunderbird: if with a right click in an email, and "add filter" option would appear (for example under Organisation) and this brings you strait to the "new filter" window with 3 fields filled out: 1) name of the filter contains: the subject of the email 2)subject - contains: subject of the email 3)from - contains: sender of the email

Then you only need to change/delete a condition and 90% of the requirements are met.

It may sounds very silly, but I have to say this functionality in MS saved me so much time, with all "update" or "notice" email just been sorted away, maybe deleted or whatever.

Maybe I am rules/filter junkie but it definitely help with all the noise emails can create.

I hope i used the right forum, and maybe it helps to make a Thunderbird a little bit better.

Daniel
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:141.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/141.0

title: Der Ordner „Gesendet“ wird leer
creator: d-f-n
content:
Hallo,

Ich nutze Thunderbird seit Jahrzehnten. Nun ist mir zum zweiten Mal etwas passiert, das zum Verlust meiner eingehenden E-Mails geführt hat. Ich habe die Komprimmierungsanfrage bestätigt, und danach war der Sendeordner leer, und die Daten eines Jahres waren weg. Eine Reparatur ist nicht möglich, IMAP-Konto. Letztes Jahr passierte dasselbe, E-Mails von vor 10 Jahren waren verschwunden, nur im Sendeordner. Alle anderen Ordner sind in Ordnung. Was ist das Problem? Nie wieder Komprimierung zulassen? Das ist unglaublich ärgerlich. Viele Dinge sind unersetzlich. Wie kann ich das in Zukunft verhindern? Warum betrifft das nur den Sendeordner eines Kontos?

Freundliche Grüße

Wolfgang Nolte

Poraďte prosím. JZ.

title: Aiuto con le caselle di posta
creator: azzurramaggia
content: Buongiorno, Uso Thunderbird. Ho appena cambiato i record NS per migrare il dominio del mio sito web e relativi account email. Ho migrato le caselle di posta. Non ho ancora riconfigurato Thunderbird con i dati del nuovo provider. Mi sono accorta che il tool di migrazione ha saltato diverse cartelle all'interno di una casella di posta: le cartelle sono state ricreate ma risultano vuote. Queste cartelle si trovano ancora su Thunderbird con i loro contenuti. Chiedo questo: Posso Archiviare le cartelle da Thunderbird su una cartella in locale affinchè continuino ad essere accessibili? E successivamente modificare le configurazioni del client per sincronizzare l'account con la webmail? Il protocollo utilizzato è IMAP. In un secondo tempo, le cartelle che ho archiviato posso ritrasferirle su Thunderbird di modo che popolino le cartelle vuote e possa averle su tutti i miei dispositivi? Spero di essere stata chiara. Grazie per l'aiuto!

title: Odd new intrusive spell-check pop-up suggestion list in composer window
creator: gessel
content:
When composing a message I am getting a pop-spell check window that auto-fills the top (somewhat bizarre) suggestion. This is suboptimal for me, though it might be entertaining to compose auto-suggest random word salad messages from time to time. The heretofore behavior was to red-underline unrecognized words and permit a right-click pop-up selection for correction.

I run an ever longer list of plugins to maintain the core functionality I rely on for messaging and I realize this pop-up could be an artifact of an "upgrade" thought useful by a plugin, but before I go through a day of sequential plugin testing, if someone here knows how to revert this behavior, I'd very much appreciate it:

The insanely disruptive new behavior is the popup offering to correct "things" as "Things" [sic capitalized for some random reason, though I'm quite smitten with "Thï¿½ringens" as a "correction" to "things"]

The good (olde fashionede) spellcheck offers to correct the intentionally misspelled "thinglys" to "thingy" and correctly ignores "things".

Thing (ha) is the not-for-me version and the good-by-me version are both 128.13.0esr (64-bit), both have "enable spellcheck as you type" enabled, both are set to English (United States) (though, oddly, the order of the dictionaries is different), and both run roughly the same set of plugins, both are on Linux, bad-for-me on Ubuntu and good-by-me on Mint.

I checked Advanced Preferences for anything that might be inducing this odd popup and couldn't find anything obvious under "spellcheck" or "suggest."
metadata: ;solver_id:480589;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: sono scomparse le email di un solo indirizzo email - tutti gli altri funzionano
creator: posta32
content: ho i profile della caselle email in un NAS, che, a causa di un aggiornamento, si è riavviato con Th aperto; in TH ho 5 caselle email POP3 ed ogni CARTELLA MESSAGGI è in una cartella locale diversa; la posta in arrivo di una sola casella email è diventata illeggibile (vedevo le intestazioni ma non apriva i messaggi) ho provato a dare il comando RIPARA CARTELLA e sono sparite anche tutte le intestazioni; come faccio a recuperare le email solamente di quella casella email? ho anche (fortunatamente) una recentissima copia di backup di tutti i profili
